slides.title: Verse 1 (1)
slides.lyrics:
You are all
Big and small
Beautiful

slides.title: Verse 1 (2)
slides.lyrics:
And wonderful to 
Trust in grace
Through faith
But I'm asking to taste

slides.title: Bridge 1
slides.lyrics:
For dark is light to You
Depths are Height to you
Far is near
But Lord I need to hear from You

slides.title: Chorus
slides.lyrics:
Be near O God
Be near O God of us
Your nearness is
To us our good

slides.title: Verse 2 (1)
slides.lyrics:
Your fullness is mine
Revelation Divine

slides.title: Verse 2 (2)
slides.lyrics:
But oh to taste
To know much
More than a page
To feel Your embrace
